‚Äúseyyathapi bhikkhawe puriso alagaddaththiko agaladdagawesi agaladdagapariyesanan waramano - so pasesayya mahanthan alagaddan thamenan bhoge wa nanggutte wa ganheyya, thassa so agaladdo patipariwaththithwa hathwe wa bahaya wa anynyatharasmin wa anggapachchangge daseyya, so thathonidanan maranan wa nigachcheyya maranamaththan wa dukkhan tha‚Äò kissa hethu: duggahithaththa bhikkhawe alagaddassa ewamewa kho bhikkhawe idhekachche moghapurisa dhamman pariyapunanthi: suththan geyyan wyokaranan gathan udanan ithiwuththakan jathakan abbhuthadhamman wedallan the nan dhamman pariyapunithwa thesan dhammanan panynyaya aththan na upaparikkhanthi.
